segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen, a very ordinary scene at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streams in through a window above the sink, illuminating the space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice something quite alarming happening at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring from the faucet, and the basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually overflowing, spilling a continuous sheet onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands right in front of it, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water surrounding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so neutral, so focused on her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange disconnect, this calm concentration amidst the encroaching flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps flowing, relentless and silent.
segments.speaker: PAR
